title: Will rank ques be down all day

replies.body: There's maintenance going on for a few regions, and some services like ranked play will be unavailable.  Per the [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page, ranked could likely return around noon.  Bookmark that page for updates, and hang tight until then!

There are a few different maintenance phases going on.  The first one, which currently has ranked disabled, should be finished around noon.  That can change at any time, though, as is the nature of maintenance and unexpected issues sometimes.  There will be another maintenance late tonight that will bring everything down, possibly until morning.  Sorry for the confusion!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=gNfq3xUE,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2017-05-09T18:22:02.269+0000)
>
> There are a few different maintenance phases going on.  The first one, which currently has ranked disabled, should be finished around noon.  That can change at any time, though, as is the nature of maintenance and unexpected issues sometimes.  There will be another maintenance late tonight that will bring everything down, possibly until morning.  Sorry for the confusion!

It would be helpful to update the Service Status page with the noon ETA. Right now it only says that the servers are down for a maintenance which started at 0800 PDT, there's no ETA listed there.

Yeah, I'll see if I can get some clarification.  Keep in mind guys that I'm not part of the network team, so I'll try to get some more info.  Don't kill me if it's not back up at noon. {{summoner:31}}  :x Hang tight.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=gNfq3xUE,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2017-05-09T18:22:02.269+0000)
>
> There are a few different maintenance phases going on.  The first one, which currently has ranked disabled, should be finished around noon.  That can change at any time, though, as is the nature of maintenance and unexpected issues sometimes.  There will be another maintenance late tonight that will bring everything down, possibly until morning.  Sorry for the confusion!

Thank you for clarifying it was kinda confusing for a moment :) and when you say should be back up at noon that's noon PDT right?
Ranked games appear to be back up on NA fam!  Keep in mind there will be another maintenance later with total downtime per the [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na).
